text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Huh? My body feels sluggish—like a<n>fish out of water.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I open my eyes and find myself in an<n>empty classroom with
Agnes Tachyon<n>beside me. It's already evening.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You're perspiring profusely. Your<n>body temperature... Yes,
you're<n>burning up quite a bit.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You may be a guinea pig, but your<n>body disperses heat just
like a<n>human. But I suppose we'd have a<n>problem if you
didn't.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I look down at my body... and find<n>myself strapped down to
a mysterious<n>device!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: This reminds me of when we firstmet. But things are a littledifferent. This is my personallaboratory. Here, no one will get in myway!
choice_data_list: Laboratory... Isn't this just a normal classroom?!
Laboratory... Isn't this just a normal classroom?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Not at all! I'm here because you<n>wished for
experimentation!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You were the one who prepared this<n>environment. As such,
is it not fitting to<n>christen this as my laboratory?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaha! Know this—a guinea pig's<n>duty is to accept all
phenomena as<n>experiments waiting to happen.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You were the one who chose to be<n>my guinea pig. Do you
think you're in<n>a position to demand when, where, or<n>how
my experiments proceed?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
If I am to surpass my limits and<n>realize the latent potential of<n>
Umamusume-kind, then I must devote<n>myself to research—in
other words,<n>more experiments!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Now, I'll have you ingest my newest<n>creation. Look, this one
glows a<n>pleasant blue.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Heh-heh-heh... With this, your<n>muscular strength will
increase a<n>thousandfold, giving birth to a body<n>surpassing
that of any monster!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: All right, open wide.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm helpless before her. After all, I did<n>volunteer to be her
guinea pig.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I brace myself and slowly open my<n>mouth—

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Good morning, my guinea pig.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I squint my eyes as rays of light<n>assault my pupils. Could
the medicine<n>from earlier have been...
choice_data_list: H-huh?! Was it all a dream?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Hm? You look rather frightened, you<n>know? Did you have a
nightmare or<n>something?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
The lighting hasn't changed, yet your<n>pupils are dilated.
Heh-heh-heh...<n>You've piqued my interest. Go on, tell<n>me
all about it.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Even now, modern science is unable<n>to explain the precise
mechanisms of<n>how we dream. However, from the<n>lens of
depth psychology...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
We can infer that the image of me<n>within your subconscious
is of an<n>Umamusume who experiments on<n>people without
considering their<n>feelings.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
At any rate... I see. I can’t believe I<n>did all that in your
dream.
choice_data_list: Sorry, I didn't mean to offend you...
Sorry, I didn't mean to offend you...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Heh-heh... I really said, "Open wide"?<n>The Tachyon in your
dream actually<n>bothered asking?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: As if a guinea pig had any choice in<n>the matter!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaha! What're you looking<n>surprised for? Did you
forget that<n>you're my personal test subject?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: A shame about earlier, though. Just alittle bit more and I would'vequietly poured some Medicine-βdown your gullet.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Just to be clear, I was trying to show<n>you mercy, okay?
While β works<n>wonders, it comes at the cost of its<n>rancid
taste.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
But instead of me trying to pour 120<n>milliliters of β down
your throat without<n>spilling, be a dear and flush it down<n>
yourself.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Much easier than having to force<n>your mouth open after all!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
What's wrong, my dear little guinea<n>pig? Step one—take the
medicine from<n>my hand. Step two—drink it. Easy<n>enough,
right?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Murmur murmur...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Thanks to the side effects of β, I'm<n>stuck with my thighs
glowing<n>blue—and the local population's<n>judging
stares—for quite some time.
